description.value: Those with this Yu-vath device implanted within them are granted supernatural abilities similar to Psychic powers, even if they do not otherwise have Psychic Potential. Those with this use Renegade Psyker rules for powers, and access the Rak' Gol Psychic Discipline. Typically used by Rak' Gol Techno-Shamans who seek them out, but others may be unfortunate enough to come across such Heretical, Xenos devices and foolish or brave enough to make use of them... HB: No official implanting rules for this, but also no rules saying it can't be implanted in characters either. Make a -30 Medicae Test to implant as if a Cybernetic, 3+ DoF destroys the device. Rak' Gol Lore or Examples reduce penalty to -10.
